name: automerge-backend-wasm
description: wasm-bindgen bindings to the automerge-backend rust implementation

scripts.build: rm -rf pkg && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --dev --no-typescript && cp package.json pkg && cp index.js pkg/pkg.js
scripts.release: rm -rf pkg && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release --no-typescript && cp package.json pkg && cp index.js pkg/pkg.js
scripts.profiling: rm -rf pkg && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --profiling --no-typescript && cp package.json pkg && cp index.js pkg/pkg.js
